data.title: Resume and previous work
data.meta_description: On this page you’ll find my resume with links to delve deeper into some projects for more information about them and the challenges faced by a script supervisor on them. All projects listed were as Script/Continuity Supervisor except where otherwise noted. Features The Irishman Insert unit directed by Martin Scorsese for Netflix. Boo! A Madea Halloween […]
data.text:
On this page you’ll find my resume with links to delve deeper into some projects for more information about them and the challenges faced by a script supervisor on them. All projects listed were as Script/Continuity Supervisor except where otherwise noted.

Features

The Irishman Insert unit directed by Martin Scorsese for Netflix.

Boo! A Madea Halloween directed, written, produced & starring Tyler Perry. DP Richard Vialet. (2 weeks as #1 box office in America)

The Dark Tower 2nd unit. directed by Nikolaj Arcel, written by Nikolaj Arcel, Akiva Goldsman, Anders Thomas Jensen, & Jeff Pinkner, based on the books by Stephen King for Imagine Entertainment/Sony Pictures/MRC

Life of an Actress the Musical directed & written by Paul Chau, DP Benjamin Wolf.

You’re Next directed by Adam Wingard, written by Simon Barrett, DP Andrew Droz Palmero, distributed by Lionsgate. Starring Sharni Vinson, Joe Swanberg, Amy Seimetz, Ti West, and Barbara Crampton.

Revenge For Jolly! directed by Chadd Harbold, written by Brian Petsos, DP Daniel Katz. Starring Brian Petsos, Oscar Issac, Kristen Wiig, Elijah Wood, and Gillian Jacobs.

We Made This Movie directed by Rob Burnett, written by Rob Burnett and Jon Beckerman, DP Christopher Sargent. Starring Arthur Meyer, Arjay Smith, Stevie Steel, Edward Gelbinovich, and Annabelle Acosta.

…Around directed & written by David Spaltro, DP David A. Barkan. Starring Rob Evans, Molly Ryman, and Marcel Torres.

P.J. directed by Russ Emanuel, written by Emilio Iasiello & Mark McQuown, DP Seth Melnick. Starring John Heard, Howard Nash, Vincent Pastore, and Patrica Rae.

Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead directed by Lloyd Kaufman, written by Gabe Friedman, Lloyd Kaufman, and Dan Bova, DP Brendan Flint. Starring Jason Yachanin, Kate Graham, Allyson Sereboff, Robin Watkins, and Caleb Emerson. Also served as co-producer, editor of feature length behind the scenes documentary, and editor of deleted scenes.

Television

The Equalizer Script Supervisor for all 10 season one eps and episodes 201 & 202. CBS/NBCUniversal

Evil Additional Script Supervisor for episodes 102-113. CBS.

The Flight Attendant additional script supervisor on eps 104 & 108. Time Warner Horizon/HBO Max

Invasion script supervisor for insert unit, NY. AppleTV.

Tales of the City Script Supervisor on all 10 season 1 episodes. Netflix.

Little America script supervisor for episode 105 “Yemena”. Additional script supervisor on episodes 102 & 103. Apple TV+

Hightown additional script supervisor for episodes 105-108. Lionsgate/Starz.

Happy! Additional script supervisor on season 2 episodes 1-3. NBC Universal.

Daredevil additional script supervisor for season 3 episode 8. Marvel/Netflix/ABC Studios.

The Sinner additional script supervisor on all season 2 episodes and script supervisor on episode 8. USA Network

God Friended Me additional script supervisor on Pilot. CBS/Berlanti Productions.

The Punisher Script Supervisor for entire 13 episode first season. Marvel/Netflix/ABC Studios

Person of Interest (as additional Script Supervisor for 22 Season 3 episodes, 20 Season 4 episodes, 13 Season 5 episodes, and Script Supervisor on episodes 313 “4C”, 406 “Pretenders”, 407 “Honor Among Thieves”, & 410 “The Cold War”) CBS/Warner Bros/Bad Robot productions. Showrunners Greg Plageman and Jonathan Nolan. Starring Jim Caviezel, Michael Emerson, Kevin Chapman, Sarah Shahi, and Amy Acker.

Broad City additional script supervisor for season 3 episodes 5, 8 & 9 for BCB Productions/Comedy Central. Exec Producers Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobsen, Dave Becky.

The Affair additional script supervisor for season 2 episodes 2, 4, 5, & 6 for CBS/Showtime/Possible Productions. Starring Joshua Jackson, Dominic West & Ruth Wilson. Exec Producers Jefferey Reiner, Sarah Treem, Anya Epstein, & Abe Sylvia.

Jessica Jones additional script supervisor for episode 112. Marvel/Netflix/ABC Studios

Luke Cage Script Supervisor for all 13 Season 2 episodes. Additional script supervisor (pre-timing) for episodes 101 through 111. Additional script supervisor for filming episodes 110, 111, 112 & 113. Marvel/Netflix/ABC Studios.

Iron Fist additional script supervisor for episodes 101-113. Additional script supervisor (pre-timing) for episode 202. Marvel/Netflix/ABC Studios.

Pearl NY Unit script supervisor on “Pilot” for ABC Studios. Directed by Jim Field Smith, written by Andrew Reich.

The OA additional script supervisor for episodes 3, 4, & 8. Lunar Mining LLC, Netflix. Directed and Written by Zal Batmanglij & Brit Marling.

Neon Joe Werewolf Hunter additional script supervisor on all of season one for Adult Swim/PFFR Directed by Ryan McFaul & written by Jon Glaser. Executive producers John Lee, Steven Ast, Alyson Levy, Vernon Chatman.

Quantico NY Unit script supervisor on “Pilot” for ABC Studios/Disney/The Mark Gordon Co. Directed by Marc Munden & written by Joshua Safran.

Allegiance additional supervisor on episode 112 “Those Who Help Themselves” Universal Televison/NBC Executive Producer George Nolfi. starring Hope Davis, Scott Cohen, Margarita Levieva, & Gavin Stenhouse.

Tyler Perry’s The Haves and Have Nots shadow script supervisor brought on as additional script supervisor for season 3 cycle 4 for OWN/Tyler Perry Studios/And Action LLC. Learned all about Mr. Perry’s unique shooting style in preparation to act as additional script supervisor but the season finished shooting early. Writer/Producer/Director Tyler Perry.

The Superagent spec pilot directed by Jonah Tullis, written by Jonah Tullis & Blake J. Harris, DP Chris Edwards. Starring Matt Servitto, Todd Susman, & Sabina Gadecki.

Something Blue spec pilot written and directed by Emily Haddad.

Commercials/Industrials

Boo! A Madea Halloween Teaser national commercial for Tyler Perry Studios/Check The Gate Productions. Directed by Tyler Perry.

Duracell Powermat “Movement” web/national commercial for Black Hand Cinema. Directed by Anthony Mandler.

Amazon Kindle Paperwhite/Fire HD web/national commercial/product announcement for eyeball NYC. Directed by Amilcar Gomes.

Welvie industrial for Fire Ants Productions/ReelTag.

Shorts

Philadelphia music video for It Was Romance. Directed by Lane Moore.

Jeffrey written and directed by Russell Costanzo. DP John Dreyer. Starring Michael Neithardt.

Jung Land written and directed by Jung-Min Yoon. DP Leland Krane. Starring Leslie Alexander.

Soccer Mom written and directed by Leetal Platt. DP Chong K. Pak. Starring Gowrie Hayden and Jamie Morgan.

Non-Script Supervisor Work

Co-Director, Editor, & Writer of feature length documentary Poultry In Motion, distributed by Troma Entertainment Inc. worldwide.

Editor of several deleted scenes on Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead DVD/Blu-ray as well as Co-Producer on the film itself.

Line Producer and videographer on documentary My God for Yellow Onion Productions, Directed by Andy Deemer.

Director, Editor, & Videographer for documentary Noises From The Basement: The Making of Delusions.

Videographer for unreleased Evelyn, Evelyn concert film starring Amanda Palmer for Eleven Records.

1st Assistant Director on feature Shut Up And Do It!

2nd Assistant Director on feature Bubble Trubble.

Extras Casting on feature Turn The River.

Production assistant for The Apprentice
